bibl.title: Ptolemaic Footwear from the Amenhotep II Temple at Luxor.
bibl.note: Seven shoes, stored in a Ptolemaic jar (Italian Archaeological Expedition to the Temple of Amenhotep II, Western Thebes, 2004). - Introduction. - Description. - Use and Wear. - Comparison. - Discussion. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Journal of the American Oriental Society

bibl.seg: André J. Veldmeijer, Ptolemaic Footwear from the Amenhotep II Temple at Luxor.

Seven shoes, stored in a Ptolemaic jar (Italian Archaeological Expedition to the Temple of Amenhotep II, Western Thebes, 2004). - Introduction. - Description. - Use and Wear. - Comparison. - Discussion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
